Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the open space to the right of the "Mr. Fan" shop in the residential area below. What are your next steps?  
choose:  
A. I rise and rotate the camera upward.  
B. I descend and rotate the camera upward.  
C. I fly forward.  
D. I turn left.  
E. I rotate around.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: To navigate to the open space to the right of the "Mr. Fan" shop in the residential area, the most direct action is to fly forward. The agent is currently at an elevated position with a clear view of the area, making it feasible to move forward towards the target location. Other options like rising, descending, turning left, or rotating around do not directly contribute to reaching the specified destination as efficiently as flying forward.
